summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the payment of a portion of the cost and expense for the condemnation of land and other property for the widening of 11th Avenue West as contemplated by Ordinance No. 78800 by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor; and accepting an offer to purchase same; and further providing for the partial repayment to the Street Fund of a loan to the Condemnation Award District Fund out of the 1952 budget item "Condemnation Shortages".
